name: Sinesha

skills.name: Burning Wave
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places an extra hit on enemies with less than 50% HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Vaporize
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Puts the target's skills on cooldown. Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 25%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Immortality
skills.raw_description:
Equalizes the HP of all allies. The HP levels of all alllies will be brought up to the level of the ally with the highest HP.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +5%
Lvl. 5 Heal +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
